Buying Guides

Welcome to our Buying Guides! Whether you're a homeowner, business, or installer, we provide expert advice to help you choose the right automation solution for your gates and garage doors.

1. Choosing the Right Motor for Your Gate

Not all gate motors are the same. Here are key factors to consider:

  • Gate Type: Swing or sliding?
  • Weight & Size: Ensure the motor supports your gate's weight.
  • Power Supply: AC, DC, or solar-powered options available.
  • Security Features: Look for automatic locking and obstacle detection.

Need help choosing? Contact our experts.

2. How to Select the Best Remote Control

Consider these factors when selecting a remote control:

  • Frequency Compatibility: Ensure it matches your motor’s frequency.
  • Number of Channels: Control multiple gates with one remote.
  • Range & Battery Life: Choose remotes with extended range.

Browse our selection of remote controls.

3. Must-Have Accessories for Your Automation System

Enhance convenience and security with these accessories:

  • Safety Sensors: Prevent accidents with motion detection.
  • Keypads & RFID Readers: Add extra layers of access control.
  • Backup Batteries: Keep your system running during power outages.

Check out our accessories collection.

4. Installation vs. DIY: What’s Best for You?

Decide whether to install yourself or hire a professional:

  • DIY Installation: Good for smaller systems with clear guides.
  • Professional Installation: Recommended for complex setups.
  • Warranty & Support: Professional installation may include extra support.

Need an installer? Find a professional near you.
